channel.title: What unique genre do people make in this community?
channel.description:
I know I created a relevant post like this somewhere and somewhen, but I guess remake it, why not?
When I mean ‚ÄòUnique Genre‚Äô, I mean a Genre that‚Äôs not House, Future Bass, or Synthwave. Correct me if I‚Äôm wrong, but I think Future House, Techno, and Progressive House are the type of House Music that aren‚Äôt unique (No Offense, that‚Äôs what I hear the most in this community ¬Ø\_(„ÉÑ)_/¬Ø).
I‚Äôll go first. The unique genre I make is Drum and Bass.
You can include your songs that you didn‚Äôt made in Auxy. Also putting a link in isn‚Äôt required, but it‚Äôs optional.

item.title: What unique genre do people make in this community?
item.dc:creator: Dadmother
item.description:
I think we all make all kinds of different hybrid music.

I guess I don‚Äôt hear anyone else but me making metal tracks in Auxy

Read full topic

item.title: What unique genre do people make in this community?
item.dc:creator: Devoid-of-joy
item.description:
Whatever I make? Experiments in power electronics and death industrial. I admit these genres are more suited to analog synths and no input noise more than Auxy‚Äôs digital interface, but I do what I can with it. (Not a lot of listeners lol )

https://soundcloud.com/devoidofjoy/weltschmerz

Read full topic
